name: Grendel's Mother Memorial Hospital
flavor_text: Home sweet home!

name: The Wrong Hospital!
flavor_text: How bad are they doing back there? I only ask because…

name: Wide streets
flavor_text: Wide streets, full tank, can't lose.

name: Municipal park
flavor_text: Oh hey I took my kids here last week!

name: Closed municipal park
flavor_text: The only thing keeping the gate shut is cheap padlocks. Hit the gas.

name: Small park with fountain
flavor_text: The ambulance is not amphibious. Yet.

name: Parade
flavor_text: You think we can catch a ride on a balloon?

name: Road closed for movie filming
flavor_text: I didn't know they were making a sequel!

name: Road closed for construction
flavor_text: Ok that's a bigger pothole than I anticipated.

name: Moose on the loose
flavor_text: Those things are bigger than I thought.

name: Awful goose
flavor_text: We are outmatched.

name: Granny crossing the street
flavor_text: Hi, Mrs. Tentaclatos! Lovely day! Do you need a hand? You sure?

name: Kaiju crossing
flavor_text: Everyone's buckled up, right?

name: Funeral procession
flavor_text: (moment of silence)

name: Laundry line
flavor_text: Does one of these shorts have an address in it? I gotta send these back later.

name: Maze of one-way streets
flavor_text: I am so lost.

name: Citizen in distress
flavor_text: Do we have room for one more?

name: Bridge up for boat
flavor_text: Airborne in 3... 2... 1...

name: Falling debris
flavor_text: Never just one rock.

name: High-speed rotary
flavor_text: This thing is way easier since they banked the curve.

name: The Interchanger
flavor_text: Third exit from the left, upper branch…? No, lower!

name: Speed humps
flavor_text: Hit these too hard and we'll flip right over.

name: Traffic Jam
flavor_text: Do! You! Not! Hear! The! Siren? MOVE!

name: Broken traffic lights
flavor_text: I need more eyes.

name: Magic roundabout
flavor_text: Right, Left, Right

name: Crowded tunnel
flavor_text: Maybe if I can get up the wall a little...

name: Dark tunnel
flavor_text: Even the headlights don't help much...

name: Flooded street
flavor_text: Time for amphibious mode.

name: Dense Fog
flavor_text: Switching to radar visuals.

name: Car crash
flavor_text: Eesh, that looks bad-- STOP RUBBERNECKING!

name: Strange lights
flavor_text: Don't pay attention. Don't pay attention. Don't pay attention.

name: Tight alley
flavor_text: We're gonna lose some paint on this one.

name: Hairpin turn
flavor_text: Time for some blue sparks.

name: Non-Euclidean crossroads
flavor_text: Keep your focus. Take the left-up exit and throw it into 2nd reverse.

name: Flower market
flavor_text: Oh what a lovely GET OUT OF THE ROAD!

name: Detour for police action
flavor_text: And of course there's only one "detour" sign…

name: Cross the island
flavor_text: You're sure this is the fastest route?

name: Railroad crossing
flavor_text: Look, this is one red I don't run.

name: School zone
flavor_text: Hi, kids! Oh, that's nice! Hey, did your teacher ever tell you what to do when you see an ambulance coming?

name: Inexplicable unpaved road
flavor_text: Why am I on a dirt road. HOW.

name: Shopping district
flavor_text: Folks, I think we may have a shopping cart on the roof for the rest of the trip.

name: Two workers carrying a big sheet of plate glass
flavor_text: I have always wanted to do this.

name: Livestock market
flavor_text: I didn't know you could bring one of those within city limits.

name: Incomplete highway
flavor_text: Oh you MUST be kidding me.

name: Arboretum
flavor_text: I bet the trees are still angry from last time.

name: Shopping mall
flavor_text: Look, it's the shortest route, ok?

name: Winding street
flavor_text: Get the nausea meds out.

name: Annoying lack of street signs
flavor_text: Where the heck is Transistor Ave? Did I miss it?

name: Twelve-way intersection
flavor_text: This thing REALLY needs some lights.

name: Road clogged with debris
flavor_text: We got some turbulence coming up here.
